name: When you beat the last Microban level
name_original: When you beat the last Microban level
description:
A block pushing puzzle game where you go insane and question your entire life for finishing all of the Microban levels.

... yeah.

Credit to 5381 for the thumbnail.

Source code :

https://auroriax.github.io/PuzzleScript/play.html?p=01d156166e7cd8eb8f6263e4d039c064

Controls :

Arrow keys to move
X to action (This will be important later)
Z to undo, R to restart
